    Reference

    All functions

    bam_spatial()

    spatial growth model for large dataset or vast geographical coverage

    calc_bai()

    calculate annual basal area increment

    ccf_avg()

    ccf with master/mean chronology

    ccf_pairs()

    pair-wise ccf

    CFS_format()

    Convert tree-ring data into CFS-TRenD format

    CFS_freq()

    frequency distributions by geo-location per species

    CFS_mapping()

    Interpolate and Map Tree-Ring Data

    CFS_qa()

    Crossdating Field Season Quality Assurance Analysis

    CFS_qa_old()

    tree-ring data measurement assessment

    CFS_scale()

    compare the median of tree ring measurement of a specific site to those of nearby sites

    ci_resp()

    Compute confidence intervals for GAM predictions

    gamm_radius()

    detrending model on tree-ring width series

    gamm_site()

    growth model at site-level

    gamm_spatial()

    spatial growth model at regional-level (multiple sites)

    gam_mod()

    a general gam model

    generate_report()

    Generate Automated Reports from CFSTRenD Objects

    plot_freq()

    plot frequency distribution by geo-location per species

    plot_mapping3()

    Generate mapped spatial-temporal plots

    plot_qa()

    plotting quality assessment

    plot_resp()

    Plot GAM smooth terms with confidence intervals

    plot_scale()

    plot rw_median of the site and its neighbours on temperoral and spatial space

    read_rwl()

    read rwl files which were downloaded locally from ITRDB

    read_series()

    Read and Process Tree-Ring Series Data

    sterm_imp()

    variable importance of smooth terms in a GAM model

    table_spc()

    Generate table for species report

    table_spc_site()

    Generate table for site report including the kNN result
